name: Easter Island Hop
description:
There are many secrets on Easter Island.

Where do Easter eggs come from?

Who built this place?

Will the Bunny God grant us mercy?

Collect as many eggs as you can in five minutes.

But do not ask too many questions.

WASD, space to jump, touch egg to collect.

Sounds from FreeSounds.org
